item.title: Atomic Habits - Notes
item.description: Book Name Author Subject Area Pages Atomic Habits James Clear Habit building 271 Cover page - Atomic Habits Notes from each of the chapter Introduction How I learnt about Habits A habit is a routine or behaviour that is performed regularly - and in many cases, automatically.
